testcase.name: test a particle is included only if it fits inside the boundaries of the rectangle
test a particle within the rectangle is returned
test a particle within the rectangle is returned with an Id, Point Location and Value
test email is not sent if we detected something other than higgs-boson
test email is sent if we detected a higgs-boson
test foreign key is not violated if Particle color is in Color table
test foreign key violated if Particle color is not in Color table
test no particles are in a rectangle when there are no particles in the table
test ready for experimentation if 2 particles
test status message includes the number of particles
test we are not ready for experimentation if there is only 1 particle
test dbo.PurgeTable rejects not existing table
test that ConvertCurrency converts using given conversion rate
test that ConvertCurrencyUsingLookup converts using conversion rate in CurrencyConversion table
test that CurrencyConversion table does not allow invalid user id
test that Report gets sales data with converted currency
test that Sales table does not allow invalid currency
test that SalesReport calls CurrentReport when @showHistory = 0
test that SalesReport calls HistoricalReport instead of CurrentReport when @showHistory = 1
